about_the_game:
Music from and inspired by the video game Botany Manor, by Balloon Studios.

A collection of 16 tracks composed and performed by Composer and Audio Designer Thomas Williams that draw inspiration from orchestral, folk and small ensemble music. Nodding to the instrumentation of the time period but seeking to capture the experience of visiting the Manor through the warmth of contemporary cinematic music. The pieces are ambient, calming, lively and expansive. Presented in full including extended versions, early sketches and explorations the Botany Manor original soundtrack evokes the mysteries of the Manor, the beauty of its surroundings and thrums with the vibrant life of the forgotten plants that you will grow as Arabella Greene.

name: Botany Manor Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 600 MB available space

reviews:
“A colorful, inviting presentation, combined with a relaxing ambient soundtrack with sparse, playful melodies”
8.75/10 – Game Informer

“There's gentle, hopeful music as plants burst into life, the sound of wind, the teracotta chink of putting down a plant pot.”
N/A – Rock Paper Shotgun

“It looks fantastic, and it’s supported by a gorgeous, if sometimes subtle, soundtrack.”
10/10 – GameSpew
